amendment.description: Amendment provides that the CFTC would define the terms "commerical risk", "operating risk", and "balance sheet risk" for use in the Commodity Exchange Act to define what types of risk a company may hedge and remain eligible for limited exception to clearing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-370 to provide that the CFTC would define the terms "Commerical Risk", "operating risk", and "balance sheet risk" for purposes of the Commodity Exchange Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peterson amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
